about_the_game:
• Ever dreamed of your own transport empire?
  • Do you have rails in your heart?
  • Do you want to show everyone that a functioning railway is easy?

ODEZIE makes your dreams come true!

A gripping simulation of realistic processes and procedures awaits you, which makes you a part of the microcosmos and gives your dreams a new respite.

These functions have been implemented so far:
  • Create your own avatars
  • Create your own company
  • Choose your starting point
  • Manage operations from the operations center
  • Create timetables according to your taste
  • Coordinate a sensible line network
  • Choose destinations from many German cities [/]

    And much more!
